nodes.text: Karflo Corporation was the manufacturer of the G2-GE beamdrill and the G2-GS beamdrill. They also held interests in heavy mining, xenobiotechnology, and colonial exploration.
During the conflict with the Eternal Empire, the company bought innovative start-up companies and kept their ideas secret to secure an own industrial monopoly.
After the end of the Clone Wars the company became a voting sponsor of the Corporate Sector Authority and received a seat on its Executive Directorship Board.

The Karflo Corporation once attempted to establish a colony on the planet Gargolyn IV. During the first wave, they forcibly relocated a village of the native Cor species. In doing so, they unleashed a monster that had been bound to the land by a shaman through the Force.
